bibl.title: Letter from [Henry Rose Carter] to the Yellow Fever Commission of West Africa, February 15, 1919

div1.head: Letter from [Henry Rose Carter] to the Yellow Fever Commission of West Africa, February 15, 1919
div1.opener:
U. S. Marine Hospital.
/LC
Yellow Fever
February 15, 1919.
Yellow Fever Commission of West Africa,
Care The University Press of Liverpool,
57 Ashton Street,
Liverpool, England.
Gentlemen:
div1.p:
You were kind enough to send me some time ago a partial set
of the Reports of the Reports of The Yellow Fever Commission and
of the Bulletins of its Bureau. I have a Second Report (Y. F. C.)
and Reports on Questions Connected with the Investigation of Non-
Malarial Fevers in West Africa (Vol. 3): and the Fourth and Final
Report.

1/ Yellow Fever Bureau Bulletin
Supplement Volume 1
Reports
On Questions Connected with the
Investigation of Non-Malarial Fevers in West Africa, and

2/ Yellow Fever Bureau Bulletin
Supplement Vol. 2
Reports

On Questions Connected with the
Investigation of Non-Malarial Fevers in West Africa.

I would ask what Reports and Bulletins of this Commission are
required to make my files complete?
div1.closer: Very truly yours, Assistant Surgeon General.
